The last comment made by Firaxis caught her interest. She turned 
around and walked to the ship.

Meteara: Wait, Cybertronian Firaxis. What did you mean by this last 
sentence?

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Firaxis::
>        He makes a face of mock sadness.  "Now is that anyway to 
treat a 
> guest?"  He begins to all away.  "Oh, and one more thing."  He holds 
up one 
> finger as he turns around.  "Not all of us are here to destroy 
things.  Some 
> of us appreciate the sanctity of life.  There are probably even some 
who 
> would be willing to help you.  You'd do well to remember that."  He 
turns and 
> walks back to his ship to wait for a while and watch.
